name: Token Teknoloji A.Ş. Token 25
description: Token 25 (TKN25), launched by Token Teknoloji A.Ş., in 2022, is a basket token that includes multiple cryptocurrencies. This innovative token represents a portfolio of the top 25 cryptocurrencies that are weighted by experts. TKN25 offers its investors an easy and secure way to take the leap into the cryptocurrency world. Due to its structure which includes various cryptocurrencies, TKN25 makes it possible to trade a whole portfolio of coins with a single click of a button. With this structure, TKN25 is able to minimise the commission fee costs incurred when trading a large number of cryptocurrencies and creates the opportunity to manage a portfolio not only more easily but also more cost-effectively. TKN25, which has advantages such as simple trading, effective market monitoring and low cost, was created on Avax C-Chain. The cryptocurrencies contained in TKN25 and their weights are regularly shared transparently on token.com.tr.
